title: Track Awesome Acg Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Acg (soruly/awesome-acg) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome technologies related to Anime, Comic and Games

Tools

items.title: Awesome Acg Updates on Jan 21, 2021
items.content_text:
### Audio

*   [0x40-web (⭐413)](https://github.com/mon/0x40-web) - HTML5/CSS3 Canvas + Web Audio clone of the 0x40 Hues Flash. \[English]
*   [chiru.no](https://chiru.no/) - High quality ACG music streaming. \[English]
*   [Mikutap](https://aidn.jp/mikutap/) - Interactive music mixer with Hatsune Miku. \[English]
*   [moefm.sh (⭐15)](https://github.com/mike2718/moefm.sh) - Client script for moefm radio. \[中文]

### Danmaku

*   [ABPlayerHTML5 (⭐886)](https://github.com/jabbany/ABPlayerHTML5) - Video Player for danmaku comments. ABPlayer in HTML5. \[English/中文]
*   [CommentCoreLibrary (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/jabbany/CommentCoreLibrary) - Javascript Live Comment (Danmaku) Engine Implementation. \[English/中文]
*   [Danmaku (⭐707)](https://github.com/weizhenye/Danmaku) - High performance JavaScript danmaku engine. \[English/中文]
*   [danmaku2ass (⭐583)](https://github.com/m13253/danmaku2ass) - Convert comments from Niconico/AcFun/bilibili to ASS format. \[English/中文]
*   [DPlayer (⭐16k)](https://github.com/DIYgod/DPlayer) - HTML5 danmaku video player. \[English/中文]

### Downloaders

*   [Albireo (⭐124)](https://github.com/lordfriend/Albireo) - Bangumi auto download and management project. It has a webclient called [Deneb (⭐31)](https://github.com/lordfriend/Deneb). \[English]
*   [anilist-crawler (⭐44)](https://github.com/soruly/anilist-crawler) - Crawl data from anilist API and store in elasticsearch. \[English]
*   [BooruDownloader (⭐46)](https://github.com/fgRuslan/BooruDownloader) - Downloader for gelbooru, danbooru and other websites that use their engines. \[English]
*   [CeJS (⭐3.6k)](https://github.com/kanasimi/work_crawler) - Online novels / comics downloader. \[English/中文]
*   [Comic-DL (⭐603)](https://github.com/Xonshiz/comic-dl) - Command line tool to download manga and comics from various comic and manga sites. \[English]
*   [Danbooru Downloader (⭐417)](https://github.com/Nandaka/DanbooruDownloader) - Downloader for [Danbooru](https://danbooru.donmai.us/). \[English]
*   [DMHY (⭐471)](https://github.com/yaqinking/DMHY) - Easily download/auto-download torrent(s) from share.dmhy.org / acg.rip etc. sites for OS X. \[中文]
*   [E-Hentai-Downloader (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/ccloli/E-Hentai-Downloader) - Download E-Hentai archive as zip file. \[English]
*   [gallery-dl (⭐14k)](https://github.com/mikf/gallery-dl) - Command-line program to download image-galleries and -collections from several image hosting sites. \[English]
*   [getComic (⭐196)](https://github.com/abcfy2/getComic) - Download tencent comics. \[中文]
*   [imgbrd-grabber (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/Bionus/imgbrd-grabber) - Very customizable imageboard/booru downloader with powerful filenaming features. \[English]
*   [JComicDownloader (⭐243)](https://github.com/abc9070410/JComicDownloader) - Tool for downloading some comics and light novels from China. \[中文]
*   [MangaRipper (⭐198)](https://github.com/NguyenDanPhuong/MangaRipper) - Download manga (Japanese Comic) from several websites for your offline viewing. \[English]
*   [OkanimeDownloader (⭐11)](https://github.com/MoHD20/OkanimeDownloader) - Scrape Arabic translated anime from [Okanime](http://okanime.com/) without any effort. \[English]
*   [PixivUtil (Pixiv Downloader) (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/Nandaka/PixivUtil2) - Downloader and tag manager for [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/). \[English]
*   [Pixiv Illust (⭐8)](https://github.com/HakurouKen/pixiv-illust/) - Both a downloader and a third-party Node.js api for [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/). \[English]
*   [you-get (⭐56k)](https://github.com/soimort/you-get) - Dumb downloader that scrapes the web. \[English]

### Database APIs

*   [AniDB API](https://wiki.anidb.net/w/API) - Official API for [AniDB](https://anidb.net/). \[English]

### Data Sources

*   [Anilogia (⭐326)](https://github.com/anilogia/animedb) - Anime list database. \[日本語]
*   [anime-relations (⭐94)](https://github.com/erengy/anime-relations) - Episode redirections for Taiga. \[English]
*   [animecharactersdatabase](https://www.animecharactersdatabase.com) - A anime characters database. \[English]
*   [Animeloop](https://animeloop.org/) - Website for animeloop-cli. \[English]
*   [atwiki](https://www7.atwiki.jp/anime_wiki/) - A wiki anime STAFF. \[日本語]
*   [arm-server (⭐103)](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/arm-server) - A service for mapping Anime ID's between AniList, AniDB, MAL, and Kitsu. \[English]
*   [Bangumi Data (⭐550)](https://github.com/bangumi-data/bangumi-data) - Raw data for Japanese Anime. \[中文]
*   [cal.syoboi](https://cal.syoboi.jp) - anime bangumi timeline. \[日本語]
*   [Dhufufu (⭐2)](https://github.com/sorz/dhufufu) - Additional API Docs for some Chinese ACG sites & Related Services (currently outdated). \[中文]
*   [E-HentaiCrawler (⭐388)](https://github.com/shuiqukeyou/E-HentaiCrawler) - E-Heitai Crawler. \[中文]
*   [gochiusa-faces-dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/rignak/gochiusa-faces) - A croped animeface dataset from 'Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?' \[English]
*   [一言（ヒトコト）](http://hitokoto.cn) - Get random quotes from ACG. \[中文]
*   [hummingbird.me](https://github.com/hummingbird-me) - Anime discovery platform. \[English]
*   [iakesi (⭐6)](https://github.com/zend10/iakesi) - A website collection to map anime scene to real life locations(圣地巡礼). \[English]
*   [nyaa (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/nyaadevs/nyaa) - The software behind Nyaa.si. \[English]
*   [NyaaPantsu (⭐1k)](https://github.com/NyaaPantsu/nyaa) - Nyaa.se replacement written in golang. \[English]
*   [pixivpy (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/upbit/pixivpy) - Pixiv API for Python. \[English/中文]
*   [sakugabooru](https://sakugabooru.com) - A booru like site with anime shot clip with sakuga label. \[English]
*   [Seiyuu.moe (⭐19)](https://github.com/Ervie/Seiyuu.moe) - A webpage for searching collaborate anime works between seiyuu. \[English]
*   [Vocaloid Database (⭐399)](https://github.com/VocaDB/vocadb) - Server software used by [vocadb.net](http://vocadb.net/). \[English]

### Image Board

*   [aint.moe (⭐7)](https://github.com/maxpowa/aint.moe) - Your waifu aint moe. \[English]
*   [animeshot2 (⭐50)](https://github.com/bitinn/animeshot2) - An open and searchable image repository with telegram bot integration in Node.js. \[English]
*   [atogatari (⭐16)](https://github.com/kingdido999/atogatari) - Share and discover your favorite anime characters. \[English]
*   [BooruSurfer2 (⭐13)](https://github.com/spillerrec/BooruSurfer2) - Consistent and space-efficient interface to Booru-like image boards. \[English]
*   [danbooru (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/r888888888/danbooru) - Taggable image board written in Rails 4 for [danbooru.donmai.us](https://danbooru.donmai.us/). \[English]
*   [Hydron (⭐95)](https://github.com/bakape/hydron) - Media tagger and organizer backend and GUI frontend. \[English]
*   [Hydrus (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/hydrusnetwork/hydrus) - A personal booru-style media tagger that can import files and tags from your hard drive and popular websites. \[English]
*   [Moebooru (⭐559)](https://github.com/moebooru/moebooru) - Fork of danbooru1 that has been heavily modified. Used on [yande.re](https://yande.re/) , [Konachan.com](https://konachan.com/). \[English]
*   [PBooru (⭐50)](https://github.com/Kycklingar/PBooru) - Permanent Booru is an image board web server which takes leverage of the decentralization of IPFS to distribute its content. \[English]
*   [szurubooru (⭐811)](https://github.com/rr-/szurubooru) - Python-powered booru for small to medium communities. \[English]
*   [TagsTable (⭐532)](https://github.com/zcyzcy88/TagsTable) - Chinese ⇔ Engish translation table for common booru tags. \[中文]

### Image Generation

*   [animate-me (⭐225)](https://github.com/Aneureka/animate-me) - A miniapp to convert selfie to anime. \[中文]
*   [avatars.moe](https://avatars.moe/) - Automatic avatars generator. \[English]
*   [chainer-DCGAN (⭐936)](https://github.com/mattya/chainer-DCGAN) - Generate anime face with neural network. \[日本語]
*   [crypko.ai](https://crypko.ai) - Cryptocollectible game on anime character icons. \[English]
*   [DeepAA (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/OsciiArt/DeepAA) - Make Ascii Arts by Deep Learning. \[English]
*   [DeepAnime](https://lp.deepanime.com/) - Generate Anime automatically from illust. \[日本語]
*   [FindTwin (⭐1)](https://github.com/klimaleksus/FindTwin) - A pick and match game by random generated avatars. \[English]
*   [girl\_friend\_factory](https://hiroshiba.github.io/girl_friend_factory) - Anime character generator (Description on [Qiita](http://qiita.com/Hiroshiba/items/d5749d8896613e6f0b48)). \[日本語]
*   [gwern.net blog](https://www.gwern.net/Faces) - A anime GANs guidebook. \[English]
*   [kemonogen (⭐122)](https://github.com/aratama/kemonogen) - Kemono Friends logo generator. \[日本語]
*   [make.girls.moe](http://make.girls.moe) - Create Anime Characters with A.I. \[English]
*   [seeprettyface dongman (⭐151)](https://github.com/a312863063/seeprettyface-ganerator-dongman) - A stylegan danbooru pretrain model with Chinese document. \[中文]
*   [Talking Head Anime](https://pkhungurn.github.io/talking-head-anime/) - Talking Head Anime from a Single Image ([source](https://github.com/pkhungurn/talking-head-anime)). \[English]
*   [This Anime Does Not Exist](https://thisanimedoesnotexist.ai/) - Synthesize Your Waifu Full-body using StyleGAN2. \[English]
*   [This Fursona Does Not Exist](https://thisfursonadoesnotexist.com/) - AI-generated furries in an endless scrolling grid. \[English]
*   [This Waifu Does Not Exist](https://www.thiswaifudoesnotexist.net/) - Synthesize Your Waifu Face using StyleGAN2. \[English]
*   [TwinGAN (⭐718)](https://github.com/jerryli27/TwinGAN) - Unsupervised Image Translation for Human Portraits to anime. \[English]
*   [Waifu Labs](https://waifulabs.com/) - Synthesize Your Waifu Face Conditionally. \[English]

### Image Processing

*   [Anime4K (⭐20k)](https://github.com/bloc97/Anime4K) - A High-Quality Real Time Anime Upscaler. \[English]
*   [animeloop-cli (⭐98)](https://github.com/moeoverflow/animeloop-cli) - Automatically detect and cut anime loops. \[English]
*   [cgCompress (⭐16)](https://github.com/spillerrec/cgCompress) - Compression tool tailored for Visual Novel CGs. \[English]
*   [DeepCreamPy](https://github.com/deeppomf/DeepCreamPy) - Decensoring hentai with deep neural networks. \[English]
*   [hoshizora](https://github.com/BlueCocoa/hoshizora) - Merge two image by alpha channel to get displayed respectively on white/black background. \[English]
*   [MangaCraft (⭐707)](https://github.com/lllyasviel/MangaCraft) - Semi-automatic manga colorization. \[English]
*   [mangaEditor](http://moeka.me/mangaEditor/) - Edit manga and translate it online. \[中文]
*   [Overmix (⭐206)](https://github.com/spillerrec/Overmix) - Automatic anime screenshot stitching in high quality. \[English]
*   [PaintsChainer (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/pfnet/PaintsChainer) - Line drawing colorization using chainer. \[English]
*   [sketchKeras (⭐465)](https://github.com/lllyasviel/sketchKeras) - An u-net with some algorithm to take sketch from paints. \[English]
*   [style2paints (⭐18k)](https://github.com/lllyasviel/style2paints) - Paint line images with AI. \[English]
*   [TachibanaYoshino AnimeGAN (⭐4.6k)](https://github.com/TachibanaYoshino/AnimeGAN) - [shinkaimakoto mentioned](https://twitter.com/shinkaimakoto/status/1293130397312643072) "shinkaimakoto" animestyle transfer model \[English]
*   [upscale.wiki.anime](https://upscale.wiki/wiki/Model_Database#Manga.2FAnime) - Image Super-Resolution model wiki \[English]
*   [waifu2x (⭐28k)](https://github.com/nagadomi/waifu2x) - Image Super-Resolution for Anime-Style Art. \[English]
*   [waifu2x-converter-cpp (⭐319)](https://github.com/tanakamura/waifu2x-converter-cpp) - Improved version of waifu2x. \[English]

### Image Recognition

*   [alt-i2v (⭐35)](https://github.com/GINK03/alt-i2v) - Alternative illustration2vec implitation of sigmoids of fully connected layer. \[日本語]
*   [animeface-2009 (⭐317)](https://github.com/nagadomi/animeface-2009) - Face and Landmark Detector for Anime/Manga. Similar to lbpcascade\_animeface but more accurate. \[English]
*   [AnimeFace Search v3](http://animeface3.libotama.so/) - Face detection for Anime. Powered by [Imager::AnimeFace](http://anime.udp.jp/imager-animeface.html) and [otama - CBIR Engine (⭐61)](https://github.com/nagadomi/otama). \[日本語]
*   [AniSeg (⭐204)](https://github.com/jerryli27/AniSeg) - A faster-rcnn model for anime character segmentation. \[English]
*   [danbooru-tagger (⭐19)](https://github.com/anthony-dipofi/danbooru-tagger) - auto labeling danboorulike tags for anime illustration. \[English]
*   [deep cascaded landmark detection (⭐246)](https://github.com/kanosawa/anime_face_landmark_detection) - Anime face landmark detection by deep cascaded regression. \[English]
*   [Illustration2Vec (⭐675)](https://github.com/rezoo/illustration2vec) - Semantic Vector Representation of Illustrations. \[English]
*   [lbpcascade\_animeface (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/nagadomi/lbpcascade_animeface) - Face detector for anime/manga using OpenCV. \[English]
*   [LFFD animeface (⭐68)](https://github.com/cheese-roll/light-anime-face-detector) - A fast and light-weighted anime face detection based on LFFD \&mxnet. \[English]
*   [n\_jigen\_bot](https://t.me/n_jigen_bot) - Telegram bot. Identify if an image is 二次元 or 三次元. \[English]
*   [Osomatsu-san](http://bohemia.hatenablog.com/entry/2015/11/22/161858) - Use deep learning to distinguish the characters in Osomatsu-san. \[日本語]
*   [transfer-learning-anime (⭐190)](https://github.com/freedomofkeima/transfer-learning-anime) - Transfer learning for anime characters recognition. Powered by [lbpcascade\_animeface (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/nagadomi/lbpcascade_animeface) for face detection. Available at [MoeFlow](https://freedomofkeima.com/moeflow/). \[English]

### Image Reverse Search

*   [ascii2d](http://www.ascii2d.net/) - 2D art search. \[日本語]
*   [Gochiusearch (⭐397)](https://github.com/ksasao/Gochiusearch) - Fast Scene Search Engine for 'Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?'. \[日本語]
*   Image Search Options ([Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/image-search-options/kljmejbpilkadikecejccebmccagifhl) / [Firefox Add-on](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/image-search-options/)) - Search multiple image reverse search engines. \[English]
*   [iqdb](https://iqdb.org/) - Multi-service image search engine, source code [here](https://iqdb.org/code/). \[English]
*   [SauceNAO](https://saucenao.com/) - Reverse image search service, see database coverage [here](https://saucenao.com/status.html). \[English]
*   [saucenao.kgmi.moe](http://saucenao.kgmi.moe/) - Better front-end for SauceNAO. \[English]
*   [WAIT: What Anime Is This? (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/soruly/trace.moe) - Anime scene search engine. Powered by [liresolr (⭐180)](https://github.com/dermotte/liresolr). \[English]

### Mobile Apps

*   [Amadeus (⭐1k)](https://github.com/Yink/Amadeus) - A side project that aims to replicate the Amadeus App shown in Steins;Gate 0. \[English]
*   [Atarashii (⭐79)](https://github.com/AnimeNeko/Atarashii) - Android client for [MyAnimeList](http://myanimelist.net/). \[English]
*   [EhViewer (⭐9.1k)](https://github.com/seven332/EhViewer) - Unofficial E-Hentai Application for Android. \[中文]
*   [KonaBot (⭐29)](https://github.com/hkalexling/KonaBot-iOS) - iOS client for [konachan.net](http://konachan.net). \[English]
*   [LNReader-Android (⭐121)](https://github.com/calvinaquino/LNReader-Android) - Light novel reader for android. \[English]
*   [NineAnimator (⭐820)](https://github.com/SuperMarcus/NineAnimator) - Elegant, concise, and intuitive anime discovery app for iOS. \[English]

### Programming

*   [aaencoder (⭐42)](https://github.com/mervick/php-aaencoder) - Convert Javascript to kaomoji(顔文字). \[日本語]
*   [gochiusa\_lang (⭐25)](https://github.com/dolciss/gochiusa_lang) - . \[日本語]
*   [hanabi (⭐250)](https://github.com/egoist/hanabi) - Colorful syntax highlighter inspired by [kemono-friends-syntax-highlight](http://pronama.azurewebsites.net/2017/02/23/kemono-friends-syntax-highlight/) and [its friends](https://gist.github.com/kuwa72/753f8ae998a84dda184c21cc874bd694). \[English]
*   [hhiro\_lang (⭐5)](https://github.com/zonuexe/hhiro_lang) - . \[日本語]
*   [kawaii-term (⭐116)](https://github.com/GINK03/kawaii-term) - Kawaii shell terminal to relieve engineer's stress. \[日本語]
*   [kemono\_friends\_lang (⭐201)](https://github.com/consomme/kemono_friends_lang) - . \[日本語]
*   [nyaruko\_lang (⭐164)](https://github.com/masarakki/nyaruko_lang) - . \[日本語]
*   [RADWIMPS (⭐276)](https://github.com/approvers/RADWIMPS) - 君の then-then-then 世は Promise で Future. \[日本語]
*   [We-i\_lang (⭐1)](https://github.com/oppai/We-i_lang) - . \[日本語]

### Subtitles

*   [aeneas (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/readbeyond/aeneas) - Automagically synchronize audio and text. \[English]
*   [ASS.js (⭐609)](https://github.com/weizhenye/ASS) - JavaScript ASS subtitle format renderer. \[English]
*   [dialogue.moe (⭐334)](https://github.com/windrises/dialogue.moe) - Search where a dialogue comes from. \[English/中文]
*   [JavascriptSubtitlesOctopus (⭐456)](https://github.com/Dador/JavascriptSubtitlesOctopus) - Displays subtitles in .ass format and easily integrates with HTML5 videos. Supports all SSA/ASS features. \[English]
*   [libjass (⭐176)](https://github.com/Arnavion/libjass) - Renders ASS subs in the browser. \[English]
*   [SubBuilder (⭐9)](https://github.com/KamigamiSub/SubBuilder) - Toolset to help checking and organizing bilingual subtitles (諸神字幕組). \[English/中文]
*   [subsearch.madsck.com](http://subsearch.madsck.com/) - Search source of anime dialogue. \[English/中文]
*   [Sushi (⭐671)](https://github.com/tp7/Sushi) - Automatic subtitle shifter based on audio. \[English]

### Tools

*   [anitomy (⭐289)](https://github.com/erengy/anitomy) - Anime video filename parser. \[English]
*   [arc\_unpacker (⭐615)](https://github.com/vn-tools/arc_unpacker) - Visual novel extracting tool in CLI. \[English]
*   [bgm (⭐20)](https://github.com/egoist/bgm) - Display bangumi list in CLI. \[中文]
*   [Comicbook (⭐313)](https://github.com/moeoverflow/comicbook) - Convert online comics to .epub e-book. \[English]
*   [getnative (⭐230)](https://github.com/Infiziert90/getnative) - Find the native resolution(s) of upscaled material (mostly anime). \[English]
*   [kuroshiro (⭐899)](https://github.com/hexenq/kuroshiro) - Japanese language utility mainly for converting Kanji-mixed sentence to Hiragana, Katakana or Romaji with furigana and okurigana modes supported. \[English]
*   [OpenCC (⭐9.1k)](https://github.com/BYVoid/OpenCC) - Project for conversion between Traditional and Simplified Chinese. \[中文]
*   [rankit.ikely.me](http://rankit.ikely.me/) - Scientific ranking of anime ratings by [Rankit (⭐86)](https://github.com/wattlebird/ranking). \[English]
*   [Shoko](https://github.com/shokoanime) - Anime Collection Manager. \[English]
*   [Taiga (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/erengy/taiga) - Lightweight anime tracker for Windows. \[English]
*   [wikipedia\_anime\_graph (⭐4)](https://github.com/Project-ShangriLa/wikipedia_anime_graph) - Calculate anime relevance from wikipedia. \[日本語]

### Web

*   [acgn-stock (⭐265)](https://github.com/mrbigmouth/acgn-stock) - Stock market for trading waifu on PPT (Taiwan). \[English/中文]
*   [awesome-bangumi (⭐271)](https://github.com/jokester/awesome-bangumi) - Collection of [bangumi.tv](http://bangumi.tv) related projects. \[中文]
*   [Bangumi scripts (⭐313)](https://github.com/bangumi/scripts) - Collection of user scripts for [bangumi.tv](http://bangumi.tv). \[中文]
*   [Deneb (⭐31)](https://github.com/lordfriend/Deneb) - Web client for [Albireo (⭐124)](https://github.com/lordfriend/Albireo). \[English]
*   [japari-pedia (⭐56)](https://github.com/miyaoka/japari-pedia) - Chrome extension that turns Wikipedia into Japari-Library. \[English]
*   [KarasamaEgg (⭐5)](https://github.com/ClassicOldSong/KarasamaEgg) - KarasamaEgg dynamic wallpaper for WallpaperEngine. \[English]
*   [Kemono Adblocker (⭐13)](https://github.com/akira02/Kemono_Adblocker) - Replace Advertisements with Kenomo Friends pictures using perceptual techniques. \[English]
*   [Moelib](http://www.moelib.com) - Website with collections of various nijigen(二次元)-related development resources with filters and multi-language support. Inspired by awesome-acg. \[English]
*   [My Diary (⭐87)](https://github.com/ssshooter/MyDiary-Vue/blob/master/README.En.md) - MyDiary from movie 「Your Name」.\[中文]
*   [nKemono (⭐17)](https://github.com/cornguo/nKemono) - [Chrome Extension](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nkemono/pfeabhccnkpilbkjncnndoahffhjgkak) that replaces all images with Kemono Friends. \[English]
*   [pixi-live2d (⭐681)](https://github.com/avgjs/pixi-live2d) - Display live2D model as a sprite in pixi.js. \[English]
*   [WebLive2D (⭐32)](https://github.com/yutarochan/WebLive2D) - Rebuild of Cybernoids' Live2D demo for interactive systems on mobile platforms. \[English]

### Uncategorized

*   [AnimeEffects (⭐765)](https://github.com/hidefuku/AnimeEffects) - 2D Animation Tool. \[English]
*   [guide.encode.moe (⭐153)](https://github.com/Irrational-Encoding-Wizardry/guide.encode.moe) - A anime RIPPER manual. \[English]
*   [notify.moe (⭐353)](https://github.com/animenotifier/notify.moe) - Fetches your anime "watching" list and notifies you when a new anime episode is available. \[English]
items.content_html:
Audio

  • 0x40-web (⭐413) - HTML5/CSS3 Canvas + Web Audio clone of the 0x40 Hues Flash. [English]
  • chiru.no - High quality ACG music streaming. [English]
  • Mikutap - Interactive music mixer with Hatsune Miku. [English]
  • moefm.sh (⭐15) - Client script for moefm radio. [中文]

Danmaku

  • ABPlayerHTML5 (⭐886) - Video Player for danmaku comments. ABPlayer in HTML5. [English/中文]
  • CommentCoreLibrary (⭐1.9k) - Javascript Live Comment (Danmaku) Engine Implementation. [English/中文]
  • Danmaku (⭐707) - High performance JavaScript danmaku engine. [English/中文]
  • danmaku2ass (⭐583) - Convert comments from Niconico/AcFun/bilibili to ASS format. [English/中文]
  • DPlayer (⭐16k) - HTML5 danmaku video player. [English/中文]

Downloaders

  • Albireo (⭐124) - Bangumi auto download and management project. It has a webclient called Deneb (⭐31). [English]
  • anilist-crawler (⭐44) - Crawl data from anilist API and store in elasticsearch. [English]
  • BooruDownloader (⭐46) - Downloader for gelbooru, danbooru and other websites that use their engines. [English]
  • CeJS (⭐3.6k) - Online novels / comics downloader. [English/中文]
  • Comic-DL (⭐603) - Command line tool to download manga and comics from various comic and manga sites. [English]
  • Danbooru Downloader (⭐417) - Downloader for Danbooru. [English]
  • DMHY (⭐471) - Easily download/auto-download torrent(s) from share.dmhy.org / acg.rip etc. sites for OS X. [中文]
  • E-Hentai-Downloader (⭐2.1k) - Download E-Hentai archive as zip file. [English]
  • gallery-dl (⭐14k) - Command-line program to download image-galleries and -collections from several image hosting sites. [English]
  • getComic (⭐196) - Download tencent comics. [中文]
  • imgbrd-grabber (⭐2.8k) - Very customizable imageboard/booru downloader with powerful filenaming features. [English]
  • JComicDownloader (⭐243) - Tool for downloading some comics and light novels from China. [中文]
  • MangaRipper (⭐198) - Download manga (Japanese Comic) from several websites for your offline viewing. [English]
  • OkanimeDownloader (⭐11) - Scrape Arabic translated anime from Okanime without any effort. [English]
  • PixivUtil (Pixiv Downloader) (⭐2.5k) - Downloader and tag manager for Pixiv. [English]
  • Pixiv Illust (⭐8) - Both a downloader and a third-party Node.js api for Pixiv. [English]
  • you-get (⭐56k) - Dumb downloader that scrapes the web. [English]

Database APIs

  • AniDB API - Official API for AniDB. [English]

Data Sources

  • Anilogia (⭐326) - Anime list database. [日本語]
  • anime-relations (⭐94) - Episode redirections for Taiga. [English]
  • animecharactersdatabase - A anime characters database. [English]
  • Animeloop - Website for animeloop-cli. [English]
  • atwiki - A wiki anime STAFF. [日本語]
  • arm-server (⭐103) - A service for mapping Anime ID's between AniList, AniDB, MAL, and Kitsu. [English]
  • Bangumi Data (⭐550) - Raw data for Japanese Anime. [中文]
  • cal.syoboi - anime bangumi timeline. [日本語]
  • Dhufufu (⭐2) - Additional API Docs for some Chinese ACG sites & Related Services (currently outdated). [中文]
  • E-HentaiCrawler (⭐388) - E-Heitai Crawler. [中文]
  • gochiusa-faces-dataset - A croped animeface dataset from 'Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?' [English]
  • 一言（ヒトコト） - Get random quotes from ACG. [中文]
  • hummingbird.me - Anime discovery platform. [English]
  • iakesi (⭐6) - A website collection to map anime scene to real life locations(圣地巡礼). [English]
  • nyaa (⭐3.3k) - The software behind Nyaa.si. [English]
  • NyaaPantsu (⭐1k) - Nyaa.se replacement written in golang. [English]
  • pixivpy (⭐1.9k) - Pixiv API for Python. [English/中文]
  • sakugabooru - A booru like site with anime shot clip with sakuga label. [English]
  • Seiyuu.moe (⭐19) - A webpage for searching collaborate anime works between seiyuu. [English]
  • Vocaloid Database (⭐399) - Server software used by vocadb.net. [English]

Image Board

  • aint.moe (⭐7) - Your waifu aint moe. [English]
  • animeshot2 (⭐50) - An open and searchable image repository with telegram bot integration in Node.js. [English]
  • atogatari (⭐16) - Share and discover your favorite anime characters. [English]
  • BooruSurfer2 (⭐13) - Consistent and space-efficient interface to Booru-like image boards. [English]
  • danbooru (⭐2.5k) - Taggable image board written in Rails 4 for danbooru.donmai.us. [English]
  • Hydron (⭐95) - Media tagger and organizer backend and GUI frontend. [English]
  • Hydrus (⭐2.7k) - A personal booru-style media tagger that can import files and tags from your hard drive and popular websites. [English]
  • Moebooru (⭐559) - Fork of danbooru1 that has been heavily modified. Used on yande.re , Konachan.com. [English]
  • PBooru (⭐50) - Permanent Booru is an image board web server which takes leverage of the decentralization of IPFS to distribute its content. [English]
  • szurubooru (⭐811) - Python-powered booru for small to medium communities. [English]
  • TagsTable (⭐532) - Chinese ⇔ Engish translation table for common booru tags. [中文]

Image Generation

  • animate-me (⭐225) - A miniapp to convert selfie to anime. [中文]
  • avatars.moe - Automatic avatars generator. [English]
  • chainer-DCGAN (⭐936) - Generate anime face with neural network. [日本語]
  • crypko.ai - Cryptocollectible game on anime character icons. [English]
  • DeepAA (⭐1.5k) - Make Ascii Arts by Deep Learning. [English]
  • DeepAnime - Generate Anime automatically from illust. [日本語]
  • FindTwin (⭐1) - A pick and match game by random generated avatars. [English]
  • girl_friend_factory - Anime character generator (Description on Qiita). [日本語]
  • gwern.net blog - A anime GANs guidebook. [English]
  • kemonogen (⭐122) - Kemono Friends logo generator. [日本語]
  • make.girls.moe - Create Anime Characters with A.I. [English]
  • seeprettyface dongman (⭐151) - A stylegan danbooru pretrain model with Chinese document. [中文]
  • Talking Head Anime - Talking Head Anime from a Single Image (source). [English]
  • This Anime Does Not Exist - Synthesize Your Waifu Full-body using StyleGAN2. [English]
  • This Fursona Does Not Exist - AI-generated furries in an endless scrolling grid. [English]
  • This Waifu Does Not Exist - Synthesize Your Waifu Face using StyleGAN2. [English]
  • TwinGAN (⭐718) - Unsupervised Image Translation for Human Portraits to anime. [English]
  • Waifu Labs - Synthesize Your Waifu Face Conditionally. [English]

Image Processing

  • Anime4K (⭐20k) - A High-Quality Real Time Anime Upscaler. [English]
  • animeloop-cli (⭐98) - Automatically detect and cut anime loops. [English]
  • cgCompress (⭐16) - Compression tool tailored for Visual Novel CGs. [English]
  • DeepCreamPy - Decensoring hentai with deep neural networks. [English]
  • hoshizora - Merge two image by alpha channel to get displayed respectively on white/black background. [English]
  • MangaCraft (⭐707) - Semi-automatic manga colorization. [English]
  • mangaEditor - Edit manga and translate it online. [中文]
  • Overmix (⭐206) - Automatic anime screenshot stitching in high quality. [English]
  • PaintsChainer (⭐3.8k) - Line drawing colorization using chainer. [English]
  • sketchKeras (⭐465) - An u-net with some algorithm to take sketch from paints. [English]
  • style2paints (⭐18k) - Paint line images with AI. [English]
  • TachibanaYoshino AnimeGAN (⭐4.6k) - shinkaimakoto mentioned "shinkaimakoto" animestyle transfer model [English]
  • upscale.wiki.anime - Image Super-Resolution model wiki [English]
  • waifu2x (⭐28k) - Image Super-Resolution for Anime-Style Art. [English]
  • waifu2x-converter-cpp (⭐319) - Improved version of waifu2x. [English]

Image Recognition

  • alt-i2v (⭐35) - Alternative illustration2vec implitation of sigmoids of fully connected layer. [日本語]
  • animeface-2009 (⭐317) - Face and Landmark Detector for Anime/Manga. Similar to lbpcascade_animeface but more accurate. [English]
  • AnimeFace Search v3 - Face detection for Anime. Powered by Imager::AnimeFace and otama - CBIR Engine (⭐61). [日本語]
  • AniSeg (⭐204) - A faster-rcnn model for anime character segmentation. [English]
  • danbooru-tagger (⭐19) - auto labeling danboorulike tags for anime illustration. [English]
  • deep cascaded landmark detection (⭐246) - Anime face landmark detection by deep cascaded regression. [English]
  • Illustration2Vec (⭐675) - Semantic Vector Representation of Illustrations. [English]
  • lbpcascade_animeface (⭐1.9k) - Face detector for anime/manga using OpenCV. [English]
  • LFFD animeface (⭐68) - A fast and light-weighted anime face detection based on LFFD &mxnet. [English]
  • n_jigen_bot - Telegram bot. Identify if an image is 二次元 or 三次元. [English]
  • Osomatsu-san - Use deep learning to distinguish the characters in Osomatsu-san. [日本語]
